entry.def: Auto-immune describes medical conditions in which normal cells are attacked by the body's immune system.

example.tran: 风湿性关节炎等自身免疫疾病

example.ex: ...an auto-immune reaction in which the body becomes sensitive to aspects of itself.
example.tran: 机体对自身各个方面变得敏感的自身免疫反应

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the immune response of the body against substance normally present in the body
